summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fairview Avenue from Denny Way to Aloha Street et al, in the City of Seattle, grading and regrading and constructing wooden curbs & gutters under Ordinance No. 15321, creating Local Improvement District No. 1408 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
